purpose: Demonstrate the integration of large language models with Reflex for building interactive applications.
principle: Utilizes the Reflex framework to create interactive applications that leverage large language models for various tasks.
reusability: Examples can be adapted for different LLM tasks, providing a foundation for developers to build upon using Reflex.
limitations: Examples are primarily for demonstration purposes and may not be production-ready or optimized for all use cases.
name: reflex-llm-examples
highlight: Showcases various examples and use cases of integrating large language models with Reflex framework.
